finder.query: WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND DS_CONTR_SRC_REF_NUM = ?dsContrSrcRefNum01? AND CONTR_INTFC_SRC_TP_CD = ?contrIntfcSrcTpCd01? AND DS_CONTR_INTFC_BAT_NUM = ?dsContrIntfcBatNum01? AND (( CONTR_INTFC_SRC_TP_CD = ?contrIntfcSrcTpCd02A? AND CPO_SVC_DTL_PK = ?contrIntfcSrcTpCd02B?) OR CONTR_INTFC_SRC_TP_CD <> ?contrIntfcSrcTpCd03?) AND ( ALLOC_INTFC_STS_CD <> ?allocIntfcStsCd01? OR ALLOC_INTFC_STS_CD IS NULL) AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
